00040         public function PCPClient(PCPUserCredentials $useCredentials, PCPWikiSystem $wikiSystem){
00041                 $this->usedUC = $useCredentials;
00042                 $this->targetWiki = $wikiSystem;
00043                 $this->_returnFormat = '&format=php';
00044                 $this->cookieFile = './cookiejar.txt';

00047         public function login(PCPUserCredentials $userCredentials=NULL){
00048                 // check if new user credentials are set
00049                 if($userCredentials!= NULL && $this->usedUC->un!=$userCredentials->un){
00050                         $this->usedUC = $userCredentials;
00051                 }
00052                 if($userCredentials==NULL){
00053                         $userCredentials=$this->usedUC;
00054                 }
00055 
00056                 foreach (PCPUtil::replaceInHash($this->lgQuery,
00057                 array($userCredentials->un,$userCredentials->pwd)) as $__parameter=>$__parameterValue){
00058                         $__parameters.=$__parameter.'='.$__parameterValue.'&';
00059                 }
00060 
00061                 $__request = $this->targetWiki->url.'/'.$this->targetWiki->api.'?'. // adds the main part
00062                 $__parameters. // adds the parameters
00063                 $this->_returnFormat; // sets the return format
00064 
00065                 $__curlHandler = curl_init();
00066                 curl_setopt($__curlHandler, CURLOPT_URL, $__request);
00067                 if ($this->targetWiki->proxyAddr != "") {
00068                         curl_setopt($__curlHandler, CURLOPT_PROXY, $this->targetWiki->proxyAddr);
00069                 }
00070                 curl_setopt($__curlHandler, CURLOPT_HEADER, false);// don't return the header in teh result
00071                 curl_setopt($__curlHandler, CURLOPT_COOKIEJAR, $this->cookieFile);
00072                 curl_setopt($__curlHandler, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, 1);
00073                 curl_setopt($__curlHandler, CURLOPT_POST, 1); // use the POST method
00074                 curl_setopt($__curlHandler, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, "wpName=".$this->usedUC->un."&wpPassword=".$this->usedUC->pwd."&wpLoginattempt=true");
00075                 $__serializedResult = curl_exec($__curlHandler);
00076                 curl_close($__curlHandler);
00077 
00078                 $__result = unserialize($__serializedResult);
00079                 if ($__result['login']['result']!=="Success"){
00080                         return NULL;
00081                 }else{
00082                         $this->usedUC->id = $__result['login']['lguserid'];
00083                         $this->usedUC->pwd = ''; // remove the password
00084                         $this->usedUC->lgToken = $__result['login']['lgtoken'];
00085                 }
00086                 return $this->usedUC;
00087         }

00093         public function getEditToken(PCPUserCredentials $userCredentials=NULL, $title=NULL){
00094                 // check if new user credentials are set
00095                 if($userCredentials!= NULL && $this->usedUC->un!=$userCredentials->un){
00096                         $this->usedUC = $userCredentials;
00097                         $this->login();
00098                 }
00099 
00100                 if($this->usedUC->editToken !== NULL){
00101                         return $this->usedUC->editToken;
00102                 }else{
00103                         if(!isset($title)){
00104                                 // try with Main Page
00105                                 $title="Main Page";
00106                         }
00107                         // extract only the first title
00108                         $title = PCPUtil::trimFirstTitle($title);
00109 
00110                         foreach (PCPUtil::replaceInHash($this->queryEditToken, array(urlencode($title))) as $__parameter=>$__parameterValue){
00111                                 $__parameters.=$__parameter.'='.$__parameterValue.'&';
00112                         }
00113 
00114                         $__request = $this->targetWiki->url.'/'.$this->targetWiki->api.'?'. // adds the main part
00115                         $__parameters. // adds the parameters
00116                         $this->_returnFormat; // sets the return format
00117 
00118                         $__curlHandler = curl_init();
00119                         curl_setopt($__curlHandler, CURLOPT_URL, $__request);
00120                         if ($this->targetWiki->proxyAddr != "") {
00121                                 curl_setopt($__curlHandler, CURLOPT_PROXY, $this->targetWiki->proxyAddr);
00122                         }
00123                         curl_setopt($__curlHandler, CURLOPT_HEADER, false); // don't return the header in teh result
00124                         curl_setopt($__curlHandler, CURLOPT_COOKIEJAR, $this->cookieFile);
00125                         curl_setopt($__curlHandler, CURLOPT_COOKIEFILE, $this->cookieFile); // set the file where cookies from which cookies are being read
00126                         curl_setopt($__curlHandler, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, 1);
00127                         curl_setopt($__curlHandler, CURLOPT_POST, 1);// use the POST method
00128                         #curl_setopt($__curlHandler, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, "wpName=".$this->usedUC->un."&wpLoginToken=".$this->usedUC->lgToken);
00129                         $__serializedResult = curl_exec($__curlHandler);
00130                         curl_close($__curlHandler);
00131 
00132                         $__result = unserialize($__serializedResult);
00133                         if (!isset($__result['query']['pages'])){
00134                                 // error handling
00135                                 return NULL;
00136                         }else{
00137                                 // there could be more than one page in the result
00138                                 // each entry in the hashmap has the page ID as key
00139                                 foreach ($__result['query']['pages'] as $__pageid => $__pageObject){
00140                                         // get the page that has the matching title
00141                                         if ($__result['query']['pages'][$__pageid]['title'] === $title){
00142                                                 $this->usedUC->editToken = $__result['query']['pages'][$__pageid]['edittoken'];
00143                                         }
00144                                 }
00145 
00146                         }
00147                 }
00148                 return $this->usedUC->editToken;
00149         }

00195         public function readPage(PCPUserCredentials $uc=NULL, $title= NULL, $revisionID = NULL){
00196                 if($userCredentials!= NULL && $this->usedUC->un!=$userCredentials->un){
00197                         $this->usedUC = $userCredentials;
00198                         $this->login();
00199                 }
00200 
00201                 $this->page = new PCPPage($title);
00202 
00203                 // extract only the first title
00204                 $title = PCPUtil::trimFirstTitle($title);
00205                         
00206                 foreach (PCPUtil::replaceInHash($this->queryReadPage,array(urlencode($title)))
00207                 as $__parameter=>$__parameterValue){
00208                         $__parameters.=$__parameter.'='.$__parameterValue.'&';
00209                 }
00210 
00211                 $__request = $this->targetWiki->url.'/'.$this->targetWiki->api.'?'. // adds the main part
00212                 $__parameters. // adds the parameters
00213                 $this->_returnFormat; // sets the return format
00214 
00215                 $__curlHandler = curl_init();
00216                 curl_setopt($__curlHandler, CURLOPT_URL, $__request);
00217                 if ($this->targetWiki->proxyAddr != "") {
00218                         curl_setopt($__curlHandler, CURLOPT_PROXY, $this->targetWiki->proxyAddr);
00219                 }
00220                 curl_setopt($__curlHandler, CURLOPT_HEADER, false);// don't return the header in teh result
00221                 curl_setopt($__curlHandler, CURLOPT_COOKIEJAR, $this->cookieFile);
00222                 curl_setopt($__curlHandler, CURLOPT_COOKIEFILE, $this->cookieFile);// set the file where cookies from which cookies are being read
00223                 curl_setopt($__curlHandler, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, 1);
00224                 curl_setopt($__curlHandler, CURLOPT_POST, 1);// use the POST method
00225                 #curl_setopt($__curlHandler, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, "wpName=".$this->usedUC->un."&wpLoginToken=".$this->usedUC->lgToken);
00226                 $__serializedResult = curl_exec($__curlHandler);
00227                 curl_close($__curlHandler);
00228 
00229                 $__result = unserialize($__serializedResult);
00230                 if (!isset($__result['query']['pages'])){
00231                         // error handling
00232                         // print ("ERROR: Reading a single page failed".__FILE__);
00233                         return NULL;
00234                 }else{
00235                         // there could be more than one page in the result
00236                         // each entry in the hashmap has the page ID as key
00237                         foreach ($__result['query']['pages'] as $__pageid => $__pageObject){
00238                                 if ($__result['query']['pages'][$__pageid]['title'] === $title){
00239                                         // get the page that has the matching title
00240                                         if ($__pageid !== -1){
00241                                                 // the page exists
00242                                                 $this->page->pageid=$__pageid;
00243                                                 $this->page->title=$__result['query']['pages'][$__pageid]['title'];
00244                                                 $this->page->lastrevid=$__result['query']['pages'][$__pageid]['lastrevid'];
00245                                                 $this->page->basetimestamp=$__result['query']['pages'][$__pageid]['touched'];
00246                                                 $this->page->namespace=$__result['query']['pages'][$__pageid]['ns'];
00247 
00248                                                 if($revisionID !==NULL){
00249                                                         foreach ($__result['query']['pages'][$__pageid]['revisions'] as $__idx => $__revision){
00250                                                                 if($__revision['revid'] === $revisionID){
00251                                                                         $this->page->usedrevid = $revisionID;
00252                                                                         $this->page->text = $__revision['*'];
00253                                                                 }
00254                                                         }
00255                                                 }else{
00256                                                         $this->page->usedrevid = $__result['query']['pages'][$__pageid]['lastrevid'];
00257                                                         foreach ($__result['query']['pages'][$__pageid]['revisions'] as $__idx => $__revision){
00258                                                                 if($__revision['revid'] === $this->page->lastrevid){
00259                                                                         $this->page->text = $__result['query']['pages'][$__pageid]['revisions'][$__idx]['*'];
00260                                                                 }
00261                                                         }
00262                                                 }
00263                                         }else{
00264                                                 // print ("WARNING: The page $title does not exist.");
00265                                                 return NULL;
00266                                         }
00267 
00268                                 }
00269                         }
00270                         return $this->page;
00271                 }
00272         }

00274         public function updatePage(PCPUserCredentials $uc=NULL, $title= NULL, $text = NULL, $summary=NULL, $basetimestamp = NULL, $md5_hash = NULL){
00275                 // check if new user credentials are set
00276                 if($userCredentials!= NULL && $this->usedUC->un!=$userCredentials->un){
00277                         $this->usedUC = $userCredentials;
00278                         $this->login();
00279                 }
00280 
00281                 if(!isset($title)){
00282                         return false;
00283                 }
00284 
00285                 // get the edit token for the page
00286                 $this->getEditToken(NULL, urldecode($title));
00287 
00288                 // extract only the first title
00289                 $title = PCPUtil::trimFirstTitle($title);
00290                         
00291 
00292                 if( $md5_hash !== NULL){
00293                         if ($basetimestamp === NULL)
00294                         {
00295                                 // $basetimestamp = $this->page->basetimestamp; // use the last revision
00296                                 unset($this->queryUpdatePage['basetimestamp']);
00297                                 foreach (PCPUtil::replaceInHash($this->queryUpdatePage, array(urlencode( $title),urlencode($this->usedUC->editToken), urlencode($text), urlencode($summary), urlencode($md5_hash)))
00298                                 as $__parameter=>$__parameterValue){
00299                                         $__parameters.=$__parameter.'='.$__parameterValue.'&';
00300                                 }
00301                         }else{
00302                                 foreach (PCPUtil::replaceInHash($this->queryUpdatePage, array(urlencode( $title),urlencode($this->usedUC->editToken), urlencode($text), urlencode($summary), urlencode($basetimestamp), urlencode($md5_hash)))
00303                                 as $__parameter=>$__parameterValue){
00304                                         $__parameters.=$__parameter.'='.$__parameterValue.'&';
00305                                 }
00306                         }
00307                 }else{
00308                         unset($this->queryUpdatePage['md5']);
00309                         if ($basetimestamp === NULL)
00310                         {
00311                                 // $basetimestamp = $this->page->basetimestamp;
00312                                 unset($this->queryUpdatePage['basetimestamp']);
00313                                 foreach (PCPUtil::replaceInHash($this->queryUpdatePage, array(urlencode( $title),urlencode($this->usedUC->editToken), urlencode($text), urlencode($summary)))
00314                                 as $__parameter=>$__parameterValue){
00315                                         $__parameters.=$__parameter.'='.$__parameterValue.'&';
00316                                 }
00317                         }else{
00318                                 foreach (PCPUtil::replaceInHash($this->queryUpdatePage, array(urlencode( $title),urlencode($this->usedUC->editToken), urlencode($text), urlencode($summary), urlencode($basetimestamp)))
00319                                 as $__parameter=>$__parameterValue){
00320                                         $__parameters.=$__parameter.'='.$__parameterValue.'&';
00321                                 }
00322                         }
00323 
00324                 }
00325 
00326                 $__request = $this->targetWiki->url.'/'.$this->targetWiki->api.'?'. // adds the main part
00327                 $__parameters. // adds the parameters
00328                 $this->_returnFormat; // sets the return format
00329 
00330                 $__curlHandler = curl_init();
00331                 curl_setopt($__curlHandler, CURLOPT_URL, $__request);
00332                 if ($this->targetWiki->proxyAddr != "") {
00333                         curl_setopt($__curlHandler, CURLOPT_PROXY, $this->targetWiki->proxyAddr);
00334                 }
00335                 curl_setopt($__curlHandler, CURLOPT_HEADER, false);// don't return the header in teh result
00336                 curl_setopt($__curlHandler, CURLOPT_COOKIEJAR, $this->cookieFile);
00337                 curl_setopt($__curlHandler, CURLOPT_COOKIEFILE, $this->cookieFile);// set the file where cookies from which cookies are being read
00338                 curl_setopt($__curlHandler, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, 1);
00339                 curl_setopt($__curlHandler, CURLOPT_POST, 1);// use the POST method
00340                 #curl_setopt($__curlHandler, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, "wpName=".$this->usedUC->un."&wpLoginToken=".$this->usedUC->lgToken);

00349         public function deletePage(PCPUserCredentials $uc=NULL, $title=NULL, $reason=NULL){

00392         public function movePage(PCPUserCredentials $uc=NULL,$fromTitle=NULL, $toTitle=NULL, $movetalk=false, $noredirect=false){
00393                 // check if new user credentials are set
00394                 if($userCredentials!= NULL && $this->usedUC->un!=$userCredentials->un){
00395                         $this->usedUC = $userCredentials;
00396                         $this->login();
00397                 }
00398 
00399                 if(!isset($fromTitle)||!isset($toTitle)){
00400                         return false;
00401                 }
00402 
00403                 // get the edit token for the page
00404                 $this->getEditToken(NULL, urldecode($fromTitle));
00405                         
00406                 // if movetalk is not set, do not use it
00407                 if($movetalk){
00408                         $this->queryMovePage = array_merge($this->queryMovePage, array('movetalk'));
00409                 }
00410                 if($noredirect){
00411                         $this->queryMovePage = array_merge($this->queryMovePage, array('noredirect'));
00412                 }
00413 
00414                 foreach (PCPUtil::replaceInHash($this->queryMovePage, array(urlencode($fromTitle),urlencode($toTitle), urlencode($this->usedUC->editToken)))
00415                 as $__parameter=>$__parameterValue){
00416                         $__parameters.=$__parameter.'='.$__parameterValue.'&';
00417                 }
00418 
00419                 $__request = $this->targetWiki->url.'/'.$this->targetWiki->api.'?'. // adds the main part
00420                 $__parameters. // adds the parameters
00421                 $this->_returnFormat; // sets the return format
00422 
00423                 $__curlHandler = curl_init();
00424                 curl_setopt($__curlHandler, CURLOPT_URL, $__request);
00425                 if ($this->targetWiki->proxyAddr != "") {
00426                         curl_setopt($__curlHandler, CURLOPT_PROXY, $this->targetWiki->proxyAddr);
00427                 }
00428                 curl_setopt($__curlHandler, CURLOPT_HEADER, false);// don't return the header in teh result
00429                 curl_setopt($__curlHandler, CURLOPT_COOKIEJAR, $this->cookieFile);
00430                 curl_setopt($__curlHandler, CURLOPT_COOKIEFILE, $this->cookieFile);// set the file where cookies from which cookies are being read
00431                 curl_setopt($__curlHandler, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, 1);
00432                 curl_setopt($__curlHandler, CURLOPT_POST, 1);// use the POST method
00433                 #curl_setopt($__curlHandler, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, "wpName=".$this->usedUC->un."&wpLoginToken=".$this->usedUC->lgToken);
00434                 $__serializedResult = curl_exec($__curlHandler);
00435                 curl_close($__curlHandler);
00436 
00437                 $__result = unserialize($__serializedResult);
00438                 return $__result;
00439         }

00441         public function deleteCookies(){
00442                 return unlink($this->cookieFile);
00443         }
00444 
00445         public function __destruct(){
00446                 if(file_exists($this->cookieFile)){
00447                         $this->deleteCookies();
00448                 }
00449         }
